description.introduction: My name is Jacek Walasik and I am self-taught Javascript coder.
description.experience: I've been tinkering with Web Developement for over 2 years. All my projects are available on GitHub and my favorites are listed below.
description.skills: I specialize in Full Stack solutions. I'm capable of providing complex solutions, covering whole technological stack. I can build fast websites and applications, servers and databases. For more details about my skills, check this section.
description.goals: Most of all I'm searching for growth opportunities and work full of challenges. I would love to apply my knowledge and abilities as a Javascript Developer and commit myself fully to programming. If you interested in working together, feel free to contact me.
